Print US ex-defence head Donald Rumsfeld defends Iraq war handling Former US Defence Donald Rumsfeld remains largely defiant about the Iraq war, saying in a new book that had Saddam Hussein remained in power, the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today. Mr Donald Rumsfeld , 78, has written an autobiography due out next week. He concedes he could have sent more troops, and that internal US rivalries hampered post-war reconstruction. On the question
